name: Language Practice: Oral
description: Intensive practice of oral production and aural comprehension of French for students who seek to enhance their oral skills. The course provides students with the skills and vocabulary necessary in daily conversations and for an understanding of Francophone culture through exposure to songs, radio, interviews, story telling, etc… Focus on spontaneous speech, formal and informal interactions, as well as presentation skills. [24L, 12T]
exclusions: Native or near native French speakers. FRE383H5.
